data.name: FutuSim Demo
data.detailed_description:
FutuSim is a futuristic racing game with sim physics.
You take part in racing event somewhere on the Earth in optimistic future.

This demo has only one car and track.
Car is AWD 4-motor electric over 1000 hp in total, 1100 kg weight.

It is challenging to drive fast and stay on track. It is highly recommended to try it slow first.
For safer and faster cornering avoid blocking wheels entering corners (wheels tend to block when aerodynamic downforce decreases). Avoid wheel spin exiting corners as well.
For spectacular burnout decrease traction control level to zero.

At this stage of development there are no "racing" in general, no lap counter, no timers, no bots and multiplayer.

Just drive.

And tune some parameters, if you want.

Have fun!
And give feedback ;)
data.about_the_game:

For safer and faster cornering avoid blocking wheels entering corners (wheels tend to block when aerodynamic downforce decreases). Avoid wheel spin exiting corners as well.

At this stage of development there are no "racing" in general, no lap counter, no timers, no bots and multiplayer.

data.short_description: FutuSim is a futuristic racing game with sim physics. You take part in racing event somewhere on the Earth in optimistic future.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Core i5 2500
  • Memory: 1024 MB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GTX 1060
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 400 MB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
mac_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Any Linux version 4+ (probably)
  • Processor: Core i5 2500
  • Memory: 1024 MB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GTX 1060
  • Storage: 400 MB available space
linux_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
